fields.title: Knives Out
fields.review: A gripping mystery film that keeps you on your toes the whole film. Amazing casting, directing, and overall a roller-coaster of a film.

fields.title: Mr. Sunshine
fields.review: One of the best dramas I've ever watched. Amazing storyline, cinematography, well-rounded characters, gripping OSTs, and spectacular casting. Props to all the great actors, writers, directors, and all staffs invloved in the drama.

fields.title: Bad and Crazy
fields.review: A fresh action drama packed with action, humour, mystery, and suspense. It just seems to get better with every episode. Unique characters and great casting.

fields.title: Joker
fields.review: An interesting take on the origin of Joker. I consider this Joker film to be quite dark, therefore may not be everyone's cup of tea.

fields.title: Search WWW
fields.review: A breath of fresh air. Very unique, funny yet heartbreaking, and an overall a well thought out film. A little sprinkle of girl power also gives the film a fun twist.

fields.title: Itaewon Class
fields.review: A drama revolving around vengeance. Great acting and film direction, may not be my favourite drama.

fields.title: Murder on the Orient Express
fields.review: An original adaption from one of the classic books by Agatha Christie. Great casting, plotting, and an overall solid movie.
